entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
